<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ranged Combatant](/Feats.aspx?ID=2897) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Evolution" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=394" />
<trait label="Summoner" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=392" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 68 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

</column>

---

Spines, flame jets, and holy blasts are just some of the ways your eidolon might strike from a distance. It gains a ranged [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) attack with a [range increment](/Traits.aspx?ID=248) of 30 feet that deals 1d4 damage and has the [magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103) and [propulsive](/Traits.aspx?ID=191) traits. When you select this feat, choose a damage type: acid, bludgeoning, cold, electricity, fire, negative, piercing, positive, or slashing. If your eidolon is a [celestial](/Traits.aspx?ID=23), [fiend](/Traits.aspx?ID=70), or [monitor](/Traits.aspx?ID=111) with an alignment other than true neutral, you can choose a damage type in its alignment.
name: Ranged Combatant
